results.title: A survey on the application of oral propranolol and atenolol for the management of infantile hemangiomas in mainland China
results.text_hl: Only 32 respondents had the experience of treating @<m>DISEASE_Hemihyperplasia_Isolated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565524 @@@IH@@@ with oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhao ZL, Liu C, Wang QZ, Zhang WB, Shao L, Wu HW, Zheng JW. A survey on the application of oral propranolol and atenolol for the management of infantile hemangiomas in mainland China Medicine (Baltimore). 2021 Jan 8;100(1):e24146. PMID: 33429792

results.title: Comparing the Effectiveness of Propranolol versus Atenolol in Inducing Clinical Clearance in the Treatment of Infantile Haemangioma: A Randomised Controlled Trial
results.text_hl: Future studies may be aimed at a dose-ranging efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Hemihyperplasia_Isolated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565524 @@@IH@@@ and may reveal a more favourable response to @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ at higher doses of 2 mg/kg/day.

citations.NLM: Ashraf R, Mahajan R, Malik MA, Handa S, Sinha A, De D, Sachdeva N. Comparing the Effectiveness of Propranolol versus Atenolol in Inducing Clinical Clearance in the Treatment of Infantile Haemangioma: A Randomised Controlled Trial Indian J Dermatol. 2023 Mar-Apr;68(2):148-155. PMID: 37275818

results.title: Oral atenolol treatment for infantile hemangiomas: clinical analysis of 133 consecutive patients
results.text_hl: Response of compound @<m>DISEASE_Hemihyperplasia_Isolated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565524 @@@IH@@@ on the scalp to oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhao ZL, Liu C, Wang QZ, Wu HW, Zheng JW. Oral atenolol treatment for infantile hemangiomas: clinical analysis of 133 consecutive patients Ann Transl Med. 2021 Jan;9(2):116. PMID: 33569418

results.title: Efficacy and Safety of Propranolol vs Atenolol in Infants With Problematic Infantile Hemangiomas: A Randomized Clinical Trial.
results.text_hl: The positive efficacy and safety of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ raise the question of whether it could be used as a promising therapy for @<m>DISEASE_Hemihyperplasia_Isolated</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C565524 @@@IH@@@.

citations.NLM: Ji Y, Chen S, Yang K, Zhang X, Zhou J, Li L, Xiang B, Qiu T, Dai S, Jiang X, Lu G, Qiu L, Kong F, Zhang Y. Efficacy and Safety of Propranolol vs Atenolol in Infants With Problematic Infantile Hemangiomas: A Randomized Clinical Trial. JAMA Otolaryngol Head Neck Surg. 2021 Jul 1;147(7):599-607. PMID: 33856430
